titleInfo.title: WOLFE v. MCNEIL-PPC INC. et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO.1 TO EXCLUDE EVIDENCE IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE; DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 2 TO EXCLUDE EVIDENCE IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO PLFF'S RIGHT TO SEEK RECONSIDERATION, ETC. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 3 TO EXCLUDE EVIDENCE OF STEVENS-JOHNSON SYNDROME IS GRANTED IN PART AND DENIED IN PART; DEFT'S MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 4 TO EXCLUDE EVIDENCE THAT THE OTC CHILDREN'S MOTRIN LABEL IS DENIED; DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 5 TO EXCLUDE THE 2005 CITIZEN'S PETITION IS GRANTED. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 6 TO EXCLUDE EVIDENCE OF MCNEIL'S 1984 CITIZEN'S PETITION IS DENIED. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 7 IS GRANTED. DEFT'S MOTIN IN LIMINE NO. 8 IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE, ETC. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 9 IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE, ETC. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 10 IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE, ETC. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 11 TO EXCLUDE EVIDENCE IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE; DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 12 IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE, ETC. DEFTS' MOTION IN LIMINE NO. 13 IS GRANTED WITHOUT PREJUDICE; PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE IS GRANTED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE IS GRANTED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE, REFERENCE, ARGUMENT, SUGGESTION IS GRANTED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE IS GRANTED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE IS GRANTED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE TO THE CURRENT FDS PREABLE IS GRANTED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE, THAT PLFF'S MOTHER USES IBUPROFEN IS DENIED. PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO PRECLUDE DEFT JOHNSON&JOHNSON FROM DENYING THAT IT MANUFACTURES, MARKETS, DISTRIBUTES&SELLS CHILDREN'S MOTION IS DENIED. PLFF'S MOTIN IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE THAT KILEY WOLFE DID NOT HAVE STEVENS-JOHNSON SYNDROME IS DENIED; AND PLFF'S MOTION IN LIMINE TO EXCLUDE ANY EVIDENCE OR TESTIMONY THAT KILEY WOLFE TOOK ALEVE IS DENIED, ETC. ( SIGNED BY HONORABLE JAN E. DUBOIS ON 1/6/12. ) 1/9/12 ENTERED AND COPIES E-MAILED.(gn, )
